author: Hadeel Ibrahim
title: 'Someone has to know': Prisoner sends plea for help from Dorchester
description: In a letter, Aaron Daigle says prisoners are not given hand sanitizer, they haven't been able to see any visitors in weeks, and guards don't have masks or gloves. He says he feels like he's facing a death sentence.
content:
Over the course of several collect calls from prison, Aaron Daigle dictated a plea for help to his mother.
He spent all of the previous night writing a letter and asked his mother to share it with whomever she could. 
He's afraid for his safety, and as COVI… [+5163 chars]
